entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , Kitchener-Waterloo
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 06:55 AM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -3.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Region of Waterloo Int'l Airport 08:25 AM EST Friday 23 December 2022
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -3.6°C
Pressure: 98.4 kPa
Visibility: 1.2 km
Humidity: 90 %
Wind Chill: -13
Dewpoint: -5.0°C
Wind: W 45 km/h gust 63 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Friday: Snow and blowing snow. Temperature falling to minus 13 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Snow and blowing snow. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming southwest 60 gusting to 90 this morning. Temperature falling to minus 13 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 10 this morning and minus 27 this afternoon. Forecast issued 08:26 AM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of snow and blowing snow. Temperature steady near minus 11.
entry.summary: Periods of snow and blowing snow. Local amount 5 cm. Wind southwest 60 km/h gusting to 90 diminishing to 40 gusting to 80 after midnight. Temperature steady near minus 11. Wind chill minus 27 this evening and minus 22 overnight. Forecast issued 08:26 AM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday: A few flurries. High minus 9.
entry.summary: Flurries. Local blowing snow. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 70. High minus 9. Wind chill near minus 23. Forecast issued 08:26 AM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: Flurries. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Flurries. Local blowing snow. Windy. Low minus 10. Forecast issued 08:26 AM EST Friday 23 December 2022
